about_the_game:
Indie Transporter ... not one size fits all.

DESCRIPTION

Indie Transporter is a transporter game that does a lot of things differently.
No endless straight roads, no perfectly tuned vehicles with realistic driving behavior, this is more about fun and innovation.

Would you like to transport goods with drift vehicles or racing cars and also go off-road?
Then you've definitely come to the right place.

Are you looking for a game that offers the same old stuff as all the other games?
Then keep looking.

You'll find extreme roads, mountains and valleys, different biomes and a completely customizable vehicle system.
Different surfaces offer different driving behavior, and there are also different types of tires that offer different driving behavior on different surfaces.

JOBS

You transport 7 different goods and passengers to their destination and earn money that you can invest in new vehicles and tuning.

Skills are helping you to increase your income and unlock better and more challenging jobs and some specials.

Don´t want to follow the street? Try offroading, no borders, just open world.

MODDING

The vehicle system was created by scratch and setten up to change the vehicles in all possible ways.

Bigger wheels, better engine-performance, raising body height, changing center of mass?
Everything is possible.
(more features planned)

Gymkhana Trophy Truck?
Yes, that is also possible ^^

GRAPHICS-SETTINGS

Don't like cel shading + outlining?
Then disable it.
There are more than enough settings to satisfy everyone.

DEMO = ALPHA

The demo is the last alpha version, only 7 of 70+ vehicles are available.
The demo will get no updates anymore, till v1.0 is published.

Unterschiede zur aktuellen Version:

- 63+ more vehicles
- Career + Savegame
- Achievements and skills can be unlocked
- Sell vehicles
- more cargo locations
- better minimap
- some bugfixes, enhancements and optimizations

ABOUT ME

A single developer.
Everything in the game was created by me alone, only music and sounds are purchased.

I am poor because I am retired early, I live at the bottom of society, I don't have any money to buy assets and textures and even if I had it at some point, I still wouldn't.
I am severely disabled due to autism, ADHD and some anxiety disorders and have lived in complete isolation for over 10 years, no friends, no family.

Everyone says that I must have money because I publish games on Steam.
That's wrong, I have made less money from my games than I paid to publish them on Steam (very game on Steam costs me $100)...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64-Bit
  • Processor: 6 Cores @ 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4gb Vram or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run it on lower specs, give me your feedback ^^
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10/11 64-Bit
  • Processor: 10 Cores @ 3 GHz
  • Memory: 16384 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8gb Vram or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Indie Transporter... not one size fits all. Normal vehicles, not just trucks. Steep roads, sharp turns, no stupid straight driving. No invisible walls. Fully adjustable vehicle system. Weather with dynamic snow.
